## Table for Baseline Characteristics

```{r}
library(table1)
library(r2rtf)
data(r2rtf_adsl)

tbl <- table1(~ SEX + AGE + RACE | TRT01P, data = r2rtf_adsl)
tbl
```

```{r}
tbl <- tbl %>% as.data.frame() %>% 
               as_tibble() %>% 
               mutate( across(everything(), 
                        ~ stringr::str_replace_all(.x, intToUtf8(160), " ") ) 
                      )
```

```{r}
tbl %>% 
      rtf_body() %>% 
      rtf_encode() %>% 
      write_rtf("tlf/bs-1.rtf")
```

```{r, out.width = "100%", out.height = "400px", echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center"}
knitr::include_graphics("tlf/bs-1.pdf")
```
